title: Hexcrafting
body: I can't open my hexcraft on the client. It's just a black page. Any help please?!

replies.body: Your network might be having trouble maintaining a connection with the client, which can result in the black screen you see when trying to load hextech crafting.  As Rineyy suggested, our[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide has a series of steps to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you any questions!
